metadata.feature_description: Upload, manage, and optimize images for posts including thumbnails and featured images

steps.action: Navigate to Post Editor and click Upload File tab
steps.expected: Upload interface with drag-drop area and File button should appear
steps.actual: Upload interface displayed with 'Drag and Drop Your Image Here' and 'Browse to Upload' button

steps.action: Click File button and upload a PNG image
steps.expected: Image should upload and display with Edit/Delete controls
steps.actual: Image uploaded successfully, displayed with Edit and Delete buttons

steps.action: Click Edit button on uploaded image
steps.expected: Image change dialog should appear with upload options
steps.actual: Dialog appeared with Upload File, Stored Location, and From URL tabs

steps.expected: New image should replace the existing one
steps.actual: New image replaced the previous image successfully

steps.action: Click Delete button on uploaded image
steps.expected: Image should be removed and upload interface restored
steps.actual: Image was removed and upload interface with drag-drop area was restored
From URL tab displayed with URL textbox and Upload button

steps.action: Enter image URL and click Upload
steps.expected: Image should be fetched from URL and displayed
steps.actual: Image fetched from URL and displayed with Edit/Delete controls

steps.expected: Gallery of existing images should appear
steps.actual: Gallery displayed with search, Recent Uploads filter, and thumbnail images

steps.action: Select an image and click Insert Image
steps.expected: Selected image should be inserted into post
steps.actual: Image was inserted successfully with Edit/Delete controls

steps.action: Attempt to upload a non-image file (.md file)
steps.expected: System should reject the file with appropriate error message
steps.actual: Error dialog displayed: 'An error has occurred - The file is not an image'

observations: Code review shows supported image formats: .JPG, .JPE, .BMP, .GIF, .PNG, .JPEG, .ICO, .SVG
Thumbnails are automatically generated at 210x180 pixels
Featured image thumbnails are generated at 447x240 pixels
Images are stored in the Images/Publisher folder within the portal
The UploadFromUrl endpoint allows fetching images from external URLs
SetStoredImage endpoint allows selecting existing files from the DNN file system
Drag-and-drop upload area is visible in the UI but was not directly tested (file upload via button was used instead)
